title: Happy Living at Heritage Glen
posting_body: ['Hello!', 'My name is Paige and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can!', 'Applications are $50 for each person over the age of 18.', 'Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available!', 'Westminster Park: Virtual tour available!!', '<URL>', '1 bedroom, 1 bath apt.', 'home-', '$950.00 - AVAILABLE IN AUGUST', '2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE NOW', '3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1375', 'Heritage Glen: Virtual Tours Available!!', '<URL>', '1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025.00', '2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 AVAILABLE NOW', '3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN AUGUST', '3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN AUGUST', 'Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly rent so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.', 'Qualifications:', 'To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3x times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior money owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.', 'What to Bring When You Apply:', '- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder', '- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)', '- 2 Money orders', '- One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is', 'nonrefundable)', '- One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,', 'if approved it goes towards your security deposit)']
